topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack and MidoNet Architecture

ul.li: The MidoNet Agent (Midolman) must be installed on all nodes where traffic enters or leaves the virtual topology. In this guide, these nodes are the gateway1, gateway2, gateway3, compute1 and compute2 hosts.
Though this guide explains how to build the Midonet Cluster on your cloud's controller hosts, other hosts can be used.
The Midonet Command Line Interface (CLI) can be installed on any host that has connectivity to the MidoNet Cluster. This guide assumes that the CLI is installed on all controller hosts.
The Midonet Neutron Plugin replaces the ML2 Plugin, and must be installed on the controller nodes.
